justification: "Language proficiency was assessed with the Oxford Placement Test (OPT; Allan, 2004)."
"Participants also self-rated their language skills using a six-point scale that ranged from 1 (= no knowledge of L1/L2) to 6 (= perfect knowledge)."
"Participants played a Gambling task where they had to decide whether to bet or not."
"Functional imaging was performed with a GE Discovery MR750 3T scanner, using a T2*-weighted echo planar imaging (EPI) sequence."
